file_name.description: Name of the file to be processed. The location of the file depends on the context
file_name.title: File name

service_point_id.description: Service point to be used for transactions created from this file (Loans-only).
service_point_id.title: Service point ID

statistical_code.description: Statistical code (code) to be used inventory records created from this file (Instances, Holdings, Items). Specify multiple codes using multi_field_delimiter.
statistical_code.title: Statistical code

create_source_records.description: If set to true, the source records will be created in FOLIO. If set to false, the source records will not be created in FOLIO. Only applied for MARC-based transformations.
create_source_records.title: Create source records

HridHandling.description:
Enum determining how the HRID generation should be handled.
    - default: Enumerates the HRID, building on the current value in the HRID settings
    - preserve001: Takes the 001 and uses this as the HRID.

Args:
    str (_type_): _description_
    Enum (_type_): _description_
HridHandling.title: HridHandling

description: The tenant ID to use when making requests to FOLIO APIs for this task, if different from library configuration
ecsTenantId.title: ECS tenant ID

hridHandling.description: Determining how the HRID generation should be handled.
hridHandling.title: HRID handling

defaultCallNumberTypeName.description: Default name for call number type.
defaultCallNumberTypeName.title: Default call number type name

tempLocationMapFileName.description: Temporary file name for location map. Empty string by default.
tempLocationMapFileName.title: Temporary location map file name

materialTypesMapFileName.description: File name for material types map.
materialTypesMapFileName.title: Material types map file name

loanTypesMapFileName.description: File name for loan types map.
loanTypesMapFileName.title: Loan types map file name

tempLoanTypesMapFileName.description: File name for temporary loan types map. Empty string by default.
tempLoanTypesMapFileName.title: Temporary loan types map file name

statisticalCodesMapFileName.description: Path to the file containing the mapping of statistical codes. The file should be in TSV format with legacy_stat_code and folio_code columns.
statisticalCodesMapFileName.title: Statistical code map file name

itemStatusesMapFileName.description: File name for item statuses map.
itemStatusesMapFileName.title: Item statuses map file name

callNumberTypeMapFileName.description: File name for call number type map.
callNumberTypeMapFileName.title: Call number type map file name

resetHridSettings.description: At the end of the run reset FOLIO with the HRID settings. By default is False.
resetHridSettings.title: Reset HRID settings

updateHridSettings.description: At the end of the run update FOLIO with the HRID settings. By default is True.
updateHridSettings.title: Update HRID settings

boundwithRelationshipFilePath.description: Path to a file outlining Boundwith relationships, in the style of Voyager. A TSV file with MFHD_ID and BIB_ID headers and values. By default is empty string.
boundwithRelationshipFilePath.title: Boundwith relationship file path

preventPermanentLocationMapDefault.description: Prevent the default mapping of permanent location to the default location. By default is False.
preventPermanentLocationMapDefault.title: Prevent permanent location map default
